0.12.name: wordpress/clickbank-sale-notification
0.12.description:
ClickBank Sale Notification plugin will automatically send you an email notification every time there is a transaction in your clickBank account. Its support any type of transactions ( Sale, Rebill, Refund, Chargeback, Cancel Rebill ) and it also works for both affiliate and product vendor.

How to Get ClickBank Secret Key?

  1. Go to your ClickBank Account Settings » My Site » Advanced Tools Editor.
  2. Click the Edit link in the top right corner of Advanced Tools Editor.
  3. Create your Secret Key  up to 16 letters/digits ALL CAPS.
  4. Fill in the Instant Notification URL with: http://YOURSITE.com/notify.php.
  5. Use the Secret Key you created before in the plugin settings.
